name: Elephant Eggs
description:
You're an elephant! The colossus of the jungle! Nothing can hurt you... but it *can* hurt the teensy weensy eggs on your back. Make your way through chaotic and insane arenas, using your massive, trumpety trunk to defend those helpless, fragile eggs, and try your best to deliver them safely! (Psssst, getting 54 out of 54 eggs in each level unlocks an easter egg!!)

Credits Artists Max Misha Programmers Jay Misha Level Design Max Sound Design and Music Misha UI Misha
